scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ -f && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy2: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git push origin --delete gh-pages && git add out/ -f && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
